restaurants.name: The Breakfast Club
restaurants.description: Award-winning breakfast restaurant specializing in gourmet pancakes and artisanal coffee

recipes.name: Classic Buttermilk Pancakes
recipes.description: Light and fluffy buttermilk pancakes with a golden color
instructions: Mix dry ingredients in a large bowl
Whisk eggs, buttermilk, and melted butter in another bowl
Combine wet and dry ingredients until just mixed
Heat griddle or pan over medium heat
Pour batter and cook until bubbles form on surface
Flip and cook until golden brown

Combine wet and dry ingredients until just mixed

Heat griddle or pan over medium heat
Pour batter and cook until bubbles form on surface
Flip and cook until golden brown

restaurants.description: Classic American diner serving hearty breakfast favorites since 1952

recipes.name: Lemon Ricotta Pancakes
recipes.description: Light and airy pancakes with creamy ricotta and fresh lemon zest
instructions: Mix dry ingredients in a large bowl
Whisk egg yolks, milk, ricotta, butter, lemon zest, and juice
Combine wet and dry ingredients until just mixed
Beat egg whites until soft peaks form
Gently fold egg whites into batter
Heat griddle or pan over medium-low heat
Pour batter and cook until bubbles form on surface
Flip carefully and cook until golden brown

Flip and cook until golden brown

recipes.name: Cinnamon Roll Pancakes
recipes.description: Pancakes with cinnamon swirl and cream cheese glaze
instructions: Mix dry ingredients in a large bowl
Whisk eggs, milk, and melted butter in another bowl
Combine wet and dry ingredients until just mixed
Make cinnamon swirl with brown sugar and cinnamon
Heat griddle or pan over medium heat
Pour batter and swirl cinnamon mixture
Cook until bubbles form, flip and cook until golden
Drizzle with cream cheese glaze
